Christiane N\u00fcsslein-Volhard.Awards: Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine (1995) | Sir Hans Krebs Medal (1993) | Louis-Jeantet Prize for Medicine (1992) | Albert Lasker Award for Basic Medical Research (1991) | Gottfried Wilhelm Leibniz Prize (1986)
